topic.title: Share your free software here!
topic.body: Posting links without any ads/captcha/malware or any of this bullshit, only true and clean software from around the web. I will try to collect only the best and re-upload it to clean hosting services.

1_1AL7MPy6rvULDRvLbmsxttSQALdYFy6GbM.body:
First post (test), WindowsMedia Creation tool to update to Windows 10's Fall Creators Update:
Use adblock to protect yourself from annoying ads:
[http://www.jheberg.net/captcha/mediacreationtool-3/] - some ads, many hosts
[http://dl.free.fr/getfile.pl?file=/mpTYSBlF] - cleanest host
